perturbation.original_text: 'Exclusive Spoken-Word Audio Products' means: (a) spoken-word audio-only products, in a format suitable for digital download and/or streaming, [***]
perturbation.changed_text: 'Exclusive Spoken-Word Audio Products' means: (a) spoken-word audio-only products.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the phrase 'in a format suitable for digital download and/or streaming, [***]', the definition becomes vague. Later sections might refer to specific formats for digital distribution, but this original definition now lacks that crucial detail, creating uncertainty in the enforceability of clauses related to the distribution method of these products.

perturbation.original_text: 'Non-Exclusive Spoken-Word Audio Products' means spoken-word audio-only products, in a format suitable for digital download and/or streaming (excluding Exclusive Spoken-Word Audio Products and Related Products), [***]
perturbation.changed_text: 'Non-Exclusive Spoken-Word Audio Products' means spoken-word audio-only products (excluding Exclusive Spoken-Word Audio Products and Related Products).
perturbation.explanation: Similar to the previous change, removing the phrase 'in a format suitable for digital download and/or streaming' creates ambiguity. The distinction between exclusive and non-exclusive products becomes unclear without specifying the distribution format. If later sections reference specific digital formats regarding rights or royalties, this omission introduces a contradiction and enforcement problem.

perturbation.original_text: 2.4  Technical Standards; Customer Service.  Company will at all times comply with the technical and customer service requirements and Site standards (including, without limitation, user privacy policies and customer guarantees) to be agreed upon by the Parties within forty-five (45) days after the Effective Date and attached hereto as Exhibit B.  Any dispute arising related to the creation of such requirements and standards shall be subject to the escalation procedure specified in Section 2.8  [Escalation of Certain Disputes] below.  Without limiting the generality of the foregoing Company will: (a) at all times conduct its dealings with users of the Spoken-Word Audio Sub-Section in a professional and courteous manner which reflects favorably upon ACSI and its Affiliates and the ACSI Site; and (b) in any event ensure that the customer
perturbation.changed_text: 2.4  Technical Standards; Customer Service.  Company will at all times conduct its dealings with users of the Spoken-Word Audio Sub-Section in a professional and courteous manner which reflects favorably upon ACSI and its Affiliates and the ACSI Site; and (b) in any event ensure that the customer
perturbation.explanation: The clause 'Company will at all times comply with the technical and customer service requirements and Site standards (including, without limitation, user privacy policies and customer guarantees) to be agreed upon by the Parties within forty-five (45) days after the Effective Date and attached hereto as Exhibit B' has been omitted. However, the contract continues in subsection (b) to say 'in any event ensure that the customer service'. The omission creates an inconsistency, as now no defined standard or requirements exist for customer service or technical standards. This makes it difficult to enforce requirements or to prove non-compliance by the company.
